name: Black Cat Adventures v.1 (Demo - HTML5)
description:
Black Cat Adventures is a 2d casual platformer. Explore the levels, capture the creatures with magic, eat fruits and vegetables for health, pick up hats and potions to gain magic energy. Portals transfer you between levels. Demo has 5 levels. Full game has unlimited randomly generated levels available.

Update: Unreal engine test of the html5 compile build.
Looking for feedback about game play and  any bugs you notice.
